channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Destiny’ Gets Its Third Crota’s End Version And Raid Race Today
item.description: Destiny is now bringing back Crota's End for the third time, a new record in a series that often recycles content. There's a catch this time.

item.title: Nicolas Maduro rose from bus driver to president before presiding over Venezuela’s economic collapse
item.description: In 1986, Maduro traveled to Cuba for a year of ideological instruction, his only formal education after high school. He quickly became a union leader.

item.title: French tourists didn’t believe the young guy on the subway was New York City’s new mayor, so he held up the newspaper to prove it
item.description: Zohran Mamdani also has to move to the mayor's mansion on the Upper East Side before the lease in Queens apartment ends later this month.

item.title: ‘Ahsoka’ Actor Rumored To Be Dating MJ In ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’
item.description: A new report says an actor from Ahsoka may be MJ's new boyfriend in Spider-Man: Brand New Day, which will no doubt not be great for Peter.

item.title: Is Netflix’s Top 10 Hit, Harlan Coben’s ‘Run Away,’ Worth Watching?
item.description: The new Harlan Coben adaptation, Run Away, has debuted high on Netflix's Top 10 list. But is it actually worth watching?

item.title: You probably use the same password for 30 different websites. It’s time for a passkey.
item.description: Many companies think of passkeys as just a security upgrade, but they’re really a crucial user experience initiative.

item.title: What happens next in Venezuela? The regime’s foundation remains in place even after U.S. capture of Maduro, analyst says
item.description: "So removing Maduro did not necessarily change the fundamental equation of control."

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Sunday, January 4
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: TV’s Best Spy Show Returns With A 100% Rotten Tomatoes Score After 10 Years
item.description: What is arguably TV's best spy show has returned after a ten year break with a perfectly scored season on Rotten Tomatoes.

item.title: Why retirement investors should beware of this ‘Marie Antoinette’ market

item.title: Oil and gas prices expected to stay significantly lower through 2026

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
